(Not sure.  Was Toad Borg the purple robot who was second in command, or the 
grey one who was leading the Toads?)

Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot:




Shockwave's scanners detected all incoming attacks instantly before they had 
even left a foot's distance from the attackers and he quickly formulated a 
plan in his mind.

He spun around in a barrel roll, dodging both missiles directly, flames and 
shrapnel digging into his left wing and causing huge scrapes.

The Emepror fired off twenty-five rapid laser bolts, five at Cleder, Rixer, 
Forrior, Blyer and Firearm.

"Firestarter," he said via comm., "you and Sixshot are to report to my 
location.  I require combat assistance."

"Understood." he replied.

Unitron dived down, several of the shots digging into his form.  "Afts..." he 
cursed, transforming in mid air to his tank mode, slamming to the ground, the 
barrel of his large cannon already aimed at Train Wreck.  Three large laser 
blasts launched out at Train Wreck, the machine gun mounted on his turret 
firing off ten rapid laser blasts at Hot Rod.
